Oh, Thatlldo, if you only knew the number of times that I've had "discussions" with my good woman over the merits (or lack of them) over the open ... I'll not call it Â sandwich because nothing is sandwiched together ... of bread with stuff on top.
I find all sorts of hot pastry greasy; somehow much greasier than the Cold versions. That is why I Always used to buy sausage rolls Cold because they tasted and felt far less greasy than a hot one (I would murder for a good sausage roll from a decent English pork butcher's shop right now). Also,I hear in the news that the Cold ones are cheaper too!
I once tried a hot pork pie on the advice of my father. Too disgusting to describe!
